name: Retrieve calender content records in Airtable and create tasks in ClickUp
description: Every time calendar content records are added to Airtable, Make retrieves the records, creates tasks in ClickUp. Please use this [Airtable template](https://airtable.com/shrTKBxaEsFZuau79/tbl68CqfWbfwxzeeN/viwxCIUujj1TqMurz?blocks=hide).
